title: Watch Dogs: Legion hits just $25 in Amazon's latest PS5 game deals
author: tabitha-baker
article: Watch Dogs: Legion has taken part in its fair share of PS5 deals so far, but you'll find the dystopian adventure sitting at its lowest price yet this weekend.

Amazon has the Watch Dogs: Legion PS5 edition up for just $25 right now (was $59.99). Considering this was a blockbuster launch title at release, that's some excellent value. We've previously seen this, and Assassin's Creed Valhalla (currently on sale for $34.99), going for over $30 when discounted, but that extra saving brings the latest Ubisoft title down to a stunning price point right now.

PS5 deals have eased off in the last few weeks, with several previous bargains returning to their usual price tags as the sales season comes to an end. However, this last-minute offer from Amazon is as competitive as ever.
You'll find this and more PS5 game deals just below, but if you're not in the US scroll down for more offers in your region.

We're showing you exactly how to pick up a console with our PS5 restock tracker. Or, check out the latest PS5 DualSense controller deals and Pulse 3D headset prices. We're also rounding up a range of cheap game deals across the landscape of consoles and PC.
